targets.expr: goss_tests{Product=~"$Product", Suite=~"$Suite", Test_name=~"$Test", Test_name=~"$FailedTests", Node=~"$Node", Result="FAIL"}
goss_tests{Product=~"$Product", Suite=~"$Suite", Test_name=~"$Test", Test_name!~"$FailedTests", Node=~"$Node", Result="PASS"}
